extendedInfo.description: PLEASE TRY OUR FREE (AD-SUPPORTED) DOCKET LAUNCHER APP TOO!Docket In Your Pocket (PA) (Pennsylvania)Provides access to Pennsylvania court records, including criminal charges, lawsuit filings, civil judgments, traffic offenses and more -- complete with comprehensive weekly updates!Providing unlimited mobile access to a more comprehensive set of court records than is available from the PA UJS Web Portal!  Updated weekly!-Provides unlimited access to records in Pennsylvaniaâs Criminal Courts of Common Pleas-Provides unlimited access to records in Pennsylvaniaâs Magisterial District Courts-Provides unlimited access to records in Philadelphia Municipal CourtCriminal charges reach our database just 35 days after they occur!  â¢In addition to criminal records, this app provides access to certain civil court records.Please note:  Our database currently excludes civil litigation records arising from most car accidents, malpractice claims, premises liability actions, personal injuries, etc.  We're working to add this additional data.  We hope to bring it to you soon at no additional charge!Our database contains data from January 1, 2000 to present.  Records filed prior to that date are currently unavailable.This app is not intended to provide a comprehensive background check.  However, it can provide valuable information about the civil and criminal background of others.Here's what a few of our thousands of satisfied customers are saying about our app:âââââ This application is a great app!  Everyone needs to have it!  (--by Keiceaundrea)âââââ Excellent app!  Works great.  Has lots of info. (--by Leonard)âââââ Faster than the judicial portal! (--by Jeannette)âââââ Not only a great app, but top shelf support as well.  (--by Tilghman)âââââ Told me everything I need to know!  It's a must have! (--by Coleen)â¦â¦ As featured by â¦â¦â¦ The Associated Pressâ¦ WPVI-TV - ABC Philadelphiaâ¦ WTAE-TV - ABC Pittsburghâ¦ WHP-TV - CBS Harrisburgâ¦ WJET-TV - ABC Erie â¦ WCAU-TV - NBC10 Philadelphiaâ¦ WPXI-TV - Pittsburghâ¦ WHTM-TV - ABC Harrisburgâ¦ KYW-AM 1060 Radio - CBS Philadelphiaâ¦ KQV-AM 1410 News Radio - Pittsburghâ¦ The Philadelphia Inquirerâ¦ The Pittsburgh Post-Gazetteâ¦ The Pittsburgh Tribune-Reviewâ¦ The Harrisburg Patriot-News__________________________________________________FEATURES:-- Compatible with Galaxy Tab and all Android OS smart phones.-- User-friendly interface, simple to use-- Searches are possible whenever cellular or wi-fi service exists__________________________________________________Current version does not contain:	*Images of actual documents on file at your local courthouse.	*Access to federal court records.	*Access to sealed records, certain expunged matters, certain juvenile records, etc.	*Access to records pre-dating the digital age	*Mug shots of offenders identified in court records	*Specific case filings made in each case (i.e., motions, orders, etc.)DISCLAIMERS AND TERMS OF USESearch results depend upon the accuracy of information entered into the search query.  To ensure the accuracy of your search results, please double-check the spelling of all search terms. Recent docket entries may not be reflected in search results.Docket information should not be used as a substitute for a criminal history background check which may be obtained by contacting the Pennsylvania State Police.Extreme care must be used to avoid mistaken identification when relying solely upon name, age, or address in identifying individuals charged with criminal acts.Employers who fail to comply with the provisions of the Criminal History Record Information Act (18 Pa.C.S. Â§ 9101 et seq.) may be subject to civil liability.Information obtained from this application cannot be used to determine a consumer's eligibility for credit, insurance, employment or any other purpose specified in section 604 of the Fair Credit Reporting Act (15 U.S.C. Â§ 1681 et seq.) or any other similar statute.

reviews.title: Awesome! Very useful!
reviews.comment: Best money spent.  App is accurate and easy to use.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not national records
reviews.comment: It doesn\'t show anywhere that it is ONLY for Pennsylvania.  Does nothing for me in Louisiana.  I wasted my money.
reviews.author: Pat Smith

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Can\'t wait till other states are added.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great App. Frequent updates
reviews.comment: This app\'s user interface is great! Way easier than trying to use traditional online sources.  Just like the description says, their data is updated on a weekly basis. Criminal charges appear in their database approximately 35 days after charges are filed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Pretty accurate
reviews.author: Stephanie Domonkos

reviews.title: Better than Cable
reviews.comment: I\'d rather scan Tune In for music, podcasts and many more topics of interest.  It\'s my own personal information center.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect!
reviews.comment: Great app, it does exactly what the description says!  Couldn\'t be more pleased!  Data is updated weekly and criminal records reach their DB 35 days after charges are filed!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great tool!
reviews.comment: Great tool for a single girl in Pennsylvania! Avoided getting involved with a guy who had stolen a car, impersonated a police officer, evaded the police and had illegal drugs -all in one night. Yeah- I dodged a bullet!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Application works. Would like to be able to check other states
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very good app. I get to look up anyone and everyone.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Has some info but nothing accurate or updated as per described
reviews.comment: Its nothing I would depend on for accurate information
reviews.author: Mike Miller

reviews.title: Poor
reviews.comment: Isn\'t very helpful for lawyers since it doesn\'t show next scheduled court dates. If it showed that information I\'d rate it a 5.0
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great for L.E.O.\'s
reviews.comment: It\'s not CLEAN, but great if you\'re away from your vehicle. Only gripe is it only seems to go back a few years.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: awesome
reviews.comment: Awesome app for checking your date out!   Seems to stay current.  I got pulled over a few weeks ago and it showed up almost immediately after i paid my fine.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: No issues for me.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Docket in Your Pocket
reviews.comment: Great app!
reviews.author: Mary Ann Grossman

reviews.title: Docket in your pocket
reviews.comment: Great app.
reviews.author: Erin Reiland

reviews.title: Vanvoove
reviews.comment: Best application I have
reviews.author: Vincent McChesney

reviews.title: Excellent app
reviews.comment: Used often and very accurate.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Never updated
reviews.comment: Go online 2 UJSPortal if u want 2 check dockets! This app isnt updated at all.
reviews.author: A Google User
